description: This coleslaw recipe is a neat way to use up leftover lettuce and the avocado vinaigrette is a welcome twist on classic slaw. Enjoy on burgers or as a side.
keywords: Coleslaw,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lettuce Slaw With Avocado Vinaigrette Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make avocado vinaigrette, blitz together avocado, lemon juice and olive oil in a blender and season to taste. Place in the fridge until ready to serve.
To serve, place slaw ingredients in a serving bowl and gently toss with vinaigrette.
